Ember.js

Ember is a javascript framework for "creating ambitious web applications" as they like to say.

Why important

The future of web applications is javascript. Even though you are learning Ruby and Rails, javascript frameworks will become much more important over the coming few years.

How we teach it

We'll leverage the Ember guides to have you create a simple app with the ember framework, focusing on the tricky nature of testing javascript based SPAs.

Learn more

Ember has a fantastic Getting Started guide.
